languages.text: "Потому что тот, кто отправляет других сражаться и умирать за себя, сильнее. Что бы не мнил{mf||а} себе Вольный Торговец... этот "Калькасар" могущественнее {mf|его|ее}".
"Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."
languages.original_text: "Потому что тот, кто отправляет других сражаться и умирать за себя, сильнее. Что бы не мнил{mf||а} себе Вольный Торговец... этот "Калькасар" могущественнее {mf|его|ее}".

traits.locale_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."
"Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."
"Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."
"Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

languages.text: “因为那个人比其他人更强，所以他可以随意差遣别人，让那些人为他而死。无论行商浪人怎么想……这个‘卡尔卡扎’都要比{mf|他|她}更加强大。”
languages.original_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: “因为那个人比其他人更强，所以他可以随意差遣别人，让那些人为他而死。无论行商浪人怎么想……这个‘卡尔卡扎’都要比{mf|他|她}更加强大。”

languages.text: « Parce que celui qui envoie d'autres se battre et mourir à sa place est plus fort, tout simplement. Quoi que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} puisse en penser... ce Calcazar est plus puissant {mf|que lui|qu'elle}. »
languages.original_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que celui qui envoie d'autres se battre et mourir à sa place est plus fort, tout simplement. Quoi que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} puisse en penser... ce Calcazar est plus puissant {mf|que lui|qu'elle}. »

languages.text: «Porque quien envía a otros a luchar y morir en su nombre es quien ostenta el verdadero poder. No sé qué piensa {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente... pero este "Calcazar" es el más poderoso de los dos».
languages.original_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: «Porque quien envía a otros a luchar y morir en su nombre es quien ostenta el verdadero poder. No sé qué piensa {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente... pero este "Calcazar" es el más poderoso de los dos».

languages.text: 「自分のために戦って死ぬよう他人を送り込めば、張本人はますます強くなる。自由開拓者がどう思おうと…この”カルカサル”って奴はお前より権力があるんだな」
languages.original_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: 「自分のために戦って死ぬよう他人を送り込めば、張本人はますます強くなる。自由開拓者がどう思おうと…この”カルカサル”って奴はお前より権力があるんだな」

languages.text: "Ganz einfach: Wer andere schickt, für sich zu kämpfen und zu sterben, der ist stärker. Was {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auch glauben mag ... dieser 'Calcazar' ist stärker als {mf|er|sie}."
languages.original_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz einfach: Wer andere schickt, für sich zu kämpfen und zu sterben, der ist stärker. Was {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auch glauben mag ... dieser 'Calcazar' ist stärker als {mf|er|sie}."

languages.original_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

languages.text: "Başkalarını kendisi için savaşmaya ve ölmeye gönderenler güçlüdür. Hür Tacir istediğini düşünsün... Bu 'Calcazar' ondan çok daha güçlü."
languages.original_text: "Because he who sends others to fight and die for him is stronger. Whatever the Rogue Trader might think... this 'Calcazar' is more powerful than {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: "Başkalarını kendisi için savaşmaya ve ölmeye gönderenler güçlüdür. Hür Tacir ne düşünürse düşünsün, bu 'Calcazar' kendisinden çok daha güçlü."
